text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Port Said Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Flag of Port Said Governorate.PNG | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of arms of Port Said Governorate.PNG | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Port Said in Egypt.svg | map_caption = Port Said Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Port Said (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1,345 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 764,499 | population_as_of = January 1, 2019 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EST | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = PortSaid.gov.eg | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Port Said Governorate () is one of the governorates of Egypt. It is in the northeast of the country. Its capital is the city of Port Said. Port Said is on the coast of the Mediterranean Sea at the northern gate of the Suez Canal. == Other websites == * Port Said Governorate Official website (in Arabic) * List of Governors of Port Said (in Arabic) ==References== Category:Governorates of Egypt
title: Port Said Governorate
